SELECT C.CON_NO , C.CON_WRITER , C.CON_NAME , C.CON_EMAIL , C.CON_TEL , C.CON_COMPANY , C.CON_MEMO , E.EMP_NAME AS CON_WRITER FROM CONTACTS C JOIN EMP E ON C. CON_WRITER = E.EMP_NAME WHERE C.CON_NO = #{conNo}
